pullRequest.title: Issue #3899: Modify braceAdjustment for support to google-java-format and switch-block-indentation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes Issue #3899 and Issue #6392.
Diff Regression projects: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/checkstyle/contribution/master/checkstyle-tester/projects-to-test-on.properties
Diff Regression config: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Abhishek-kumar09/Configurate/master/etc/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml

afterCommit.message: Issue #3899: Indentation: google-java-format and Checkstyle disagree about switch block indentation

nodes.bodyText:
declared config is braceAdjustment = 2
please restore this line, lets keep it as it was before as much as possible.
if you need extra text case - please create new file.
Existing text cases should be changes only if there was bug in them or behavior is changing (change in comment only).
please apply this to all other lines and files.

@@ -15,17 +15,26 @@
  * @author  jrichard                                                          //indent:1 exp:1
  */                                                                           //indent:1 exp:1
 public class InputIndentationBraceAdjustment //indent:0 exp:0
-  { //indent:2 exp:2
+{ //indent:0 exp:2 warn

afterCommit.message: Issue #3899: Indentation: google-java-format and Checkstyle disagree about switch block indentation

nodes.bodyText:
About these changes:
This file is checked against google_checks.xml, so earlier it was not following the correct indentation proposed by google. Now it does, basically this change is important for ommiting long lines of indentation x-path suppression script.

why we suggesting 16,20 ? all of them less then 24 that is base for this block.
we have the same problems in report
https://checkstyle-diff-reports.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/braceAdjustments_2020212202/reports/diff/hibernate-orm/index.html#A1
there are a lot of diffs to suggest values that not good, but previously we suggested single indentation.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -7,8 +7,8 @@ void method(Thread foo) { //indent:4 exp:4
         method( //indent:8 exp:8
                 new Thread() { //indent:16 exp:16
                         public void run() { //indent:24 exp:24
-                            } //indent:28 exp:28
+                            } //indent:28 exp:16,20,24 warn
